# Work Experience Images

This folder contains images related to work experience sections.

## Required Images:

### Company Logos (already in /public):
- `/mckinsey-logo.png` - McKinsey & Company logo
- `/gs-logo.png` - Goldman Sachs logo
- `/deutsche-logo.png` - Deutsche Bank logo

### Optional: Work Experience Screenshots/Photos
Add any additional images here such as:
- Product screenshots from your work
- Team photos
- Project visuals
- Office/workspace photos
- Achievement certificates
- Presentation slides

## Image Guidelines:
- Use high-quality images (1200px width minimum)
- Optimize for web (use tools like TinyPNG)
- Recommended formats: PNG for logos, JPG for photos
- Keep file sizes under 500KB when possible
